clubs.name: MLSA Chapter
clubs.description: Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador club at DYPCET
clubs.fullDescription: A community of student leaders who are passionate about sharing technology with their peers. We organize workshops, hackathons, and mentoring sessions to help students learn new technologies and build their careers in tech.

clubs.name: GSSOC
clubs.description: An Open source club for Beginners
clubs.fullDescription: Learn and contribute to open source projects in a supportive environment. Our club focuses on helping students understand Git, GitHub, and the open-source ecosystem through hands-on projects and mentorship.

clubs.name: Cultural Club
clubs.fullDescription: A vibrant community celebrating diversity through arts, music, and cultural events. We organize festivals, performances, and workshops that showcase the rich cultural heritage of our students.

clubs.name: Robotics Club
clubs.fullDescription: Our club focuses on designing, building, and programming robots. We participate in national and international robotics competitions and host workshops to inspire the next generation of innovators.

clubs.name: Keynote
clubs.description: A haven for book lovers and writers
clubs.fullDescription: We provide a platform for students to explore and showcase their literary talents. Our activities include book discussions, creative writing workshops, and poetry slams.
